title: Record with only float fields cannot be passed by-value (++) to foreign code

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
rustc reports a failure when trying to pass by value to foreign code a record with only float fields. Here is a minimal code:

``` rust
#[crate_type = "lib"];
type c_struct = {
    field1: libc::c_float,
    field2: libc::c_float
};

extern mod my_lib 
{
    fn my_func(++test:c_struct);
}
```
